verbose_text: The differentiation efficiency was analyzed by measuring lineage marker expression using flow cytometry and immunostaining; SOX17 expression on day 3 for the DE stage, HNF1B expression on day 5 for the FG stage, PDX1 expression on day 7 for the PP1 stage, and PDX1 and NKX6-1 expression on day 10 for the PP2 stage.
